ISO/IEC/IEEE 12207:2017(E) NOTE 3 Anticipating that some requirements can be achieved incrementally or even deferred or waived, requirements can be prioritized. 2) Define critical performance measures that enable the assessment of technical achievement. NOTE This includes defining technical and quality measures and critical performance parameters associated with each effectiveness measure identified in the software system element requirements.
